battlecode.common

Interface GameConstants


  • public interface GameConstants
    Defines constants that affect gameplay.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ARCHON_ACTIVATION_RANGE
      Archon activation range (ranged squared).
      static double ARCHON_PART_INCOME
      The part income per turn (independent of number of archons).
      static double ARCHON_REPAIR_AMOUNT
      Amount an archon repairs another bot for.
      static double ARMAGEDDON_DAY_OUTBREAK_MULTIPLIER
      Armageddon: day/night outbreak multiplier
      static int ARMAGEDDON_DAY_TIMER
      Armageddon: number of turns in day/night cycle
      static double ARMAGEDDON_DAY_ZOMBIE_REGENERATION
      Armageddon: zombie regeneration levels night and day
      static double ARMAGEDDON_NIGHT_OUTBREAK_MULTIPLIER 
      static int ARMAGEDDON_NIGHT_TIMER 
      static double ARMAGEDDON_NIGHT_ZOMBIE_REGENERATION 
      static int BASIC_SIGNALS_PER_TURN
      The maximum number of basic signals a robot can send per turn
      static double BROADCAST_ADDITIONAL_DELAY_INCREASE
      The additional delay increase of broadcasting beyond the base cost.
      static double BROADCAST_BASE_DELAY_INCREASE
      Represents the base delay increase of a broadcast.
      static double BROADCAST_RANGE_MULTIPLIER
      Represents the multiple of the sightRange for which the cost is fixed.
      static double DEN_PART_REWARD
      The parts reward for destroying a zomie den
      static double DEN_SPAWN_PROXIMITY_DAMAGE
      Amount of damage robots take when standing next to dens that are spawning.
      static double DIAGONAL_DELAY_MULTIPLIER
      The factor that delays are multiplied by when a unit moves diagonally.
      static int EXCEPTION_BYTECODE_PENALTY
      The bytecode penalty that is imposed each time an exception is thrown
      static int GAME_DEFAULT_ROUNDS
      The default game maxiumum number of rounds.
      static int GAME_DEFAULT_SEED
      The default game seed.
      static double GUARD_DAMAGE_REDUCTION
      Amount of damage guards can block
      static double GUARD_DEFENSE_THRESHOLD
      Guard takes less damage from attacks dealing more than this much damage.
      static double GUARD_ZOMBIE_MULTIPLIER
      Guard's attack is scaled by this when attacking a Zombie opponent.
      static int MAP_MAX_HEIGHT
      The maximum possible map height.
      static int MAP_MAX_WIDTH
      The maxiumum possible map width.
      static int MAP_MIN_HEIGHT
      The minimum possible map height.
      static int MAP_MIN_WIDTH
      The minumum possible map width.
      static int MESSAGE_SIGNALS_PER_TURN
      The maximum number of message signals a robot can send per turn
      static int NUMBER_OF_ARCHONS_MAX
      Maximum archons that can appear on a map (per team).
      static int NUMBER_OF_INDICATOR_STRINGS
      The number of indicator strings that a player can associate with a robot
      static int OUTBREAK_TIMER
      Number of turns that elapse for the zombie outbreak level to increase
      static double PART_INCOME_UNIT_PENALTY
      The decrease in part income per turn per unit that you have.
      static double PARTS_INITIAL_AMOUNT
      The amount that each team starts with
      static double RUBBLE_CLEAR_FLAT_AMOUNT
      Flat amount of rubble removed with each clear.
      static double RUBBLE_CLEAR_PERCENTAGE
      Percentage of rubble removed with each clear.
      static double RUBBLE_FROM_TURRET_FACTOR
      The fraction of rubble produced from a turret kill.
      static double RUBBLE_OBSTRUCTION_THRESH
      The threshold of rubble that robots (except SCOUTs) can't move through.
      static double RUBBLE_SLOW_THRESH
      The threshold of rubble that slows robots (except SCOUTS).
      static int SIGNAL_QUEUE_MAX_SIZE
      The maximum size of the message queue.
      static int TEAM_MEMORY_LENGTH
      The number of longs that your team can remember between games.
      static int TURRET_MINIMUM_RANGE
      Minimum attack range (range squared) of a Turret
      static int TURRET_TRANSFORM_DELAY
      Time to transform between Turret and TTM
      static double VIPER_INFECTION_DAMAGE
      Damage a robot receives from a Viper's infection per turn
